# BNNS.ReductionFunction.mean

**Case**

A function for reduction that computes the mean value.

## Declaration

```swift
case mean
```

## Reduction Functions

- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.max**: A reduction function that computes the maximum value.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.argMax**: A reduction function that computes the index of the maximum value.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.meanNonZero**: A reduction function that computes the mean value of nonzero elements.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.min**: A reduction function that computes the minimum value.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.argMin**: A reduction function that computes the index of the minimum value.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.sum**: A reduction function that computes the sum of all values.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.sumOfAbsolutes**: A reduction function that computes the sum of all absolute values.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.sumOfLogs(epsilon:)**: A reduction function that computes the sum of the natural logarithm of all values.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.sumOfSquares**: A reduction function that computes the sum of the square of all values.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.logicalAnd**: A reduction function that computes the logical AND of all values.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.all**: An alias of the logical AND reduction function.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.logicalOr**: A reduction function that computes the logical OR of all values.
- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.any**: An alias of the logical OR reduction function.
